DOC.brief_summary: A preliminary study to evaluate a new nasal interface and portable ventilator system in comparison to standard oxygen therapy in patients with severe chronic lung disease.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Lightweight Nasal Interface and Ventilator in Patients With Respiratory Disease
DOC.detailed_description: An open-label, randomized, controlled, crossover study in patients with severe chronic lung disease to evaluate exercise tolerance compared to standard nasal cannula oxygen therapy.
